mapper.select: SELECT post_num, post_title, post_content, post_regr_id, post_reg_dtime, post_disp_tf FROM proj_post_board WHERE post_proj_num=#{num} ORDER BY post_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO proj_post_board (post_title, post_filePath, post_content, regr_id, modr_id) VALUES(#{post_title},#{post_filePath},#{post_content},#{proj_imagePath}, #{regr_id}, #{modr_id})
